text: aur logon mein ve (bhee) hain, jo kahate hain ki ham eemaan laaye allaah par. phir jab sataaye gaye allaah ke baare mein, to samajh liya logon kee pareeksha ko allaah kee yaatana ke samaan. aur yadi aa jaaye koee sahaayata aapake paalanahaar kee or se, to avashy kahenge ki ham tumhaare saath the. to kya allaah bhalee-bhaanti avagat nahin hai usase, jo sansaar vaasiyon ke dilon mein hain
